section.name: Properties
section.p: The Composition plugin that is established by Metro in accordance with the properties listed in the table below. Properties concerning intial and system context are described under the Transit Properties specification.

tr.td: Declaration of security enablement policy. Please not that the security subsystems are largely a work in progress and by default are disabled. Enabling security should be undertaken with a complete knowledge of the internal security architecture.
Declaration of audit policy. If true - a textual description of the assembly graph of the root container is output to the logging channel under INFO priority.
The default timeout limit for the deployment or decommissioning of a component. The value is the number of milliseconds before a deployment error will be initiated.

A comma separated sequence of deployment target urls. Deployment targets may include jar files containing an embedded /BLOCK-INF/block.xml, block artifact urls, file urls, and http urls referencing a block or jar file containing an embeded block.
The declaration of a configuration target override file to be applied to the root container.
